user.title: Add Counter
user.description: Create a new counter to monitor entity states.

another_trigger.title: Add Another Trigger
another_trigger.description: Select an additional trigger for the counter. Already used entities are excluded automatically.

logic_help.title: Logic Operators
logic_help.description:
Choose how multiple triggers should be combined:
- **AND**: Counter increments only when all triggers are active at the same time.
- **OR**: Counter increments when any trigger is active.
- **NAND**: Counter increments when NOT all triggers are active.
- **NOR**: Counter increments only when none of the triggers are active.

done.title: Counter Created
done.description: The counter {name} has been added successfully with {count} trigger(s).

init.title: Manage Counters
init.description: Add or remove counters used by this integration.

select_delete.title: Delete Counter
select_delete.description: Select the counter you want to delete.

confirm_delete.title: Confirm Deletion
confirm_delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this counter?
